specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get Furious.
specialRules.name: Agitator
specialRules.label: Agitator
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get Furious.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get the Furious and Regeneration special rules.
specialRules.name: Banner
specialRules.label: Banner
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get the Furious and Regeneration special rules.

specialRules.hint: When the hero and his unit fight in melee roll one die and apply one bonus: • 1-2: Unit gets AP(+1) • 3-4: Unit gets +1 attack • 5-6: Enemies get -1 to hit Megaphone: The hero and his unit get Fast.
specialRules.name: Experiments
specialRules.label: Experiments
specialRules.description: When the hero and his unit fight in melee roll one die and apply one bonus: • 1-2: Unit gets AP(+1) • 3-4: Unit gets +1 attack • 5-6: Enemies get -1 to hit Megaphone: The hero and his unit get Fast.

specialRules.hint: The hero gets +1 when rolling to block enemy spells.
specialRules.name: Psychic Idol
specialRules.label: Psychic Idol
specialRules.description: The hero gets +1 when rolling to block enemy spells.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated pick one enemy unit within 24” and the next time it’s targeted by friendly units they get +1 to their rolls when shooting at it.
specialRules.name: Survey Vehicle
specialRules.label: Survey Vehicle
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated pick one enemy unit within 24” and the next time it’s targeted by friendly units they get +1 to their rolls when shooting at it.

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one friendly unit within 12”, which may immediately move by up to 6”.
specialRules.name: Tactical Console
specialRules.label: Tactical Console
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one friendly unit within 12”, which may immediately move by up to 6”.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated pick one friendly unit within 6”. That unit may immediately move by up to 6”.
specialRules.name: Flare Gun
specialRules.label: Flare Gun
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated pick one friendly unit within 6”. That unit may immediately move by up to 6”.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated pick one friendly unit within 6”. That unit’s weapons get +6” range next time it shoots.
specialRules.name: Spotter
specialRules.label: Spotter
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated pick one friendly unit within 6”. That unit’s weapons get +6” range next time it shoots.

spells.name: Stimulant
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Furious next time it charges.

spells.name: Mind Poison
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 3 automatic hits with AP(1).

spells.name: Hypnosis
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +1 to defense next time it takes hits.

spells.name: Brain Burst
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 4 automatic hits.

spells.name: Mind Control
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” must take a morale test. If failed you may force it to shoot at another enemy unit.

spells.name: Psychic Blaze
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 4 hits with AP(2) each.
